title: Deluxe chicken salad
ingredients: ['250g cooked chicken breast, finely chopped', '3 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon lemon juice', '1 teaspoon capers, chopped', '2 sticks celery, finely chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped green olives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh chives', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh flat leaf parsley', '1 teaspoon chopped fresh tarragon', '1 pinch ground nutmeg', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 iceberg lettuce, chopped']
